name: Potato game. Anniversary
description:
It's been 2 years since the original Potato game. released, and everybody's gone to Partyland to celebrate! Hopefully the Screaming Potato doesn't crash his own party...

WARNING: This game contains potatoes, ghosts, Michael Velociraptor, Dr. PINGAS, a stupid pirate, and really dumb Sesame Street residents; all wearing party hats for some reason. You have been warned.

This is just a small game I put together to celebrate the TOO-year anniversary of Potato game.
